resources.string: • Planned and monitored various maintenance services like Corrective Maintenance, Preventive Maintenance, and Emergency Maintenance."
• Attended Daily Meetings provided by Maintenance Department on Improvement and Breakdowns of Machine.
• Monitored Breakdowns/Issues and maintained a record of all previous and current breakdowns or issues of Machines.
• Planned and monitored various maintenance services like Corrective Maintenance, Preventive Maintenance, and Emergency Maintenance."
• Attended Daily Meetings provided by Maintenance Department on Improvement and Breakdowns of Machine.
• Monitored Breakdowns/Issues and maintained a record of all previous and current breakdowns or issues of Machines.

The Mini project deals with the case study about Coal Pulverisers, which the ones used coal for combustion in the steam-generating furnaces of fossil. By using different types of pulveriser machines to smash materials into tiny shards or granules e.g. Hammer mills, ring mills, etc.

The Major project deals with the manufacturing of various Engineering components on conventional machines involves machine accuracy and operator skill, which are used in the CNC lathe machine. The machine covers all operations in the components.
